description: Filters a Data object based on a list of keys.

filter_criteria.info: List of keys to filter by.

success.filtered_successfully: Successfully filtered data with {count} matching keys

warnings.empty_filter_criteria: No filter criteria provided. Returning empty data.
warnings.no_valid_filter_criteria: No valid filter criteria after cleaning. Returning empty data.
warnings.no_matching_keys: No matching keys found. Filter criteria: [{criteria}]. Available keys: {available_keys}
warnings.partial_match: Partial match: found {found} keys, {missing} keys missing ({missing_keys})
